tasks.label: Start GDB Server Remote arm64
args: cd ~/app && export QT_LOGGING_RULES="*.debug=true; qt.*.debug=false" && gdbserver localhost:${config:torizon_debug_port2} QtImageDisplay -qmljsdebugger=port:${config:torizon_debug_port3},block,services:DebugMessages,QmlDebugger,V8Debugger,QmlInspector,DebugTranslation

tasks.label: Start GDB Server Remote arm32
args: cd ~/app && export QT_LOGGING_RULES="*.debug=true; qt.*.debug=false" && gdbserver localhost:${config:torizon_debug_port2} QtImageDisplay -qmljsdebugger=port:${config:torizon_debug_port3},block,services:DebugMessages,QmlDebugger,V8Debugger,QmlInspector,DebugTranslation

tasks.label: Start GDB Server Remote AMD64
args: cd ~/app && export QT_LOGGING_RULES="*.debug=true; qt.*.debug=false" && gdbserver localhost:${config:torizon_debug_port2} QtImageDisplay -qmljsdebugger=port:${config:torizon_debug_port3},block,services:DebugMessages,QmlDebugger,V8Debugger,QmlInspector,DebugTranslation

tasks.label: fill-pipeline-settings
args:
-e
"✅ github-actions-settings done

'⚠️ ENV VARIABLES NEED TO BE SET IN CI/CD PLATFORM'
	DOCKER_PSSWD
	PLATFORM_CLIENT_ID
	PLATFORM_CLIENT_SECRET
	PLATFORM_CREDENTIALS
"

tasks.label: run-container-torizon-debug-arm64
args: LOCAL_REGISTRY=${config:host_ip} TAG=arm64 GPU=${config:torizon_gpu} docker-compose up -d qt-image-display-debug

tasks.label: run-container-torizon-debug-arm
args: LOCAL_REGISTRY=${config:host_ip} TAG=arm GPU=${config:torizon_gpu} docker-compose up -d qt-image-display-debug

tasks.label: run-container-torizon-debug-amd64
args: LOCAL_REGISTRY=${config:host_ip} TAG=amd64 GPU=${config:torizon_gpu} docker-compose up -d qt-image-display-debug

tasks.label: run-container-torizon-debug-amd64
args: LOCAL_REGISTRY=${config:host_ip} TAG=amd64 GPU=${config:torizon_gpu} docker-compose up -d qt-image-display-debug

tasks.label: run-container-torizon-debug-riscv64
args: LOCAL_REGISTRY=${config:host_ip} TAG=riscv64 GPU=${config:torizon_gpu} docker-compose up -d qt-image-display-debug
